properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 21 at 4:58AM PST until January 22 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep and hazardous
seas 15 to 18 ft at 16 seconds. For the Small Craft Advisory,
south winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 13 to 16
ft at 16 seconds expected. For the Hazardous Seas Watch, very
steep and hazardous seas 10 to 14 ft at 13 seconds possible.

* WHERE...All areas will be affected by Hazardous Seas Warning and
Small Craft conditions. The Hazardous Seas Watch is for areas
mainly north of Gold Beach.

* WHEN...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, until 10 PM PST this
evening. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 10 PM this evening
to 10 PM PST Wednesday. For the Hazardous Seas Watch, from
Wednesday morning through Wednesday evening.

* IMPACTS...Very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Bar crossing will become especially
treacherous.


* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Recreational boaters should remain in port. Commercial vessels
should prepare for very steep seas and consider remaining in port
until conditions improve.

NWSheadline: HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING
